mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODNO, U.USERNO,U.UNICK, R.REVIEWNO,R.REVTITLE,R.REVTEXT,R.REVREGDATE,R.REVSCORE FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODNO = R.PRODNO JOIN USERS U ON U.USERNO = R.USERNO WHERE P.PRODNO = #{prodNo}

SELECT P.PRODNO,P.PRDOTITLENAME, U.USERNO,U.UNICK, R.REVIEWNO,R.REVTITLE,R.REVTEXT,R.REVREGDATE,R.REVSCORE, I.PRODIMGNO,I.PRODIMGPATH FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODNO = R.PRODNO JOIN USERS U ON U.USERNO = R.USERNO JOIN PRODIMAGE I ON I.PRODNO = P.PRODNO WHERE U.USERNO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW VALUES (seq_reviewno.nextval, #{prodNo}, #{userNo}, #{revTitle}, #{revText}, sysdate, NULL ,#{revScore})
